mapper.select:
select org_id,org_name from tp_org
where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.org_code AS orgCode, a.org_name AS orgName, b.org_name AS orgParentName, a.org_link_man AS orgLinkMan, a.ORG_LINK_TEL AS orgLinkTel, a.ORG_MAIL AS orgMail, a.org_site AS orgSite, a.org_address AS orgAddress, a.ORG_POST_CODE AS orgPostCode, a.org_id AS orgId, a.org_fax AS orgFax, a.org_parent_id AS orgParentId, a.ORG_FLAG AS orgFlag, a.ORG_TYPE AS orgType FROM tp_org a LEFT JOIN tp_org b ON a.org_parent_id = b.org_id
select org_id as orgId,org_name as orgName from tp_org where org_parent_id is null
mapper.sql:
ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, ORG_PARENT_ID, ORG_LAW_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_SEQ,
ORG_FLAG, ORG_LINK_MAN, ORG_LINK_TEL, ORG_SITE, ORG_ADDRESS, ORG_POST_CODE,
ORG_INTRO, ORG_LICENCE, ORG_FAX, ORG_MAIL, ORG_REGFUND, ORG_SCALE, ORG_NATURE, ORG_TYPE, ORG_LOGO,
ORG_PIC, ORG_IDEA, ORG_CREATE_YEAR, ORG_REGTIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tp_org
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into tp_org (ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, ORG_PARENT_ID, ORG_LAW_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_SEQ, ORG_FLAG, ORG_LINK_MAN, ORG_LINK_TEL, ORG_SITE, ORG_ADDRESS, ORG_POST_CODE, ORG_INTRO, ORG_LICENCE, ORG_FAX, ORG_MAIL, ORG_REGFUND, ORG_SCALE, ORG_NATURE, ORG_TYPE, ORG_LOGO, ORG_PIC, ORG_IDEA, ORG_CREATE_YEAR, ORG_REGTIME) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #
{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgLawId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #
{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #
{orgLinkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLinkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #
{orgAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgPostCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #
{orgLicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #
{orgRegfund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, #
{orgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #
{orgIdea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCreateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgRegtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tp_org
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_NAME = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_PARENT_ID = #{record.orgParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_LAW_ID = #{record.orgLawId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
